f44a679f-5682-45eb-b18d-675b4d1c6526.title: What are the highest paying clients (customers) by...

messages.content: What are the highest paying clients (customers) by order value? (Please avoid the word "total" when you respond)

The following are the top 10 clients by their order value:

The top 10 clients, ranked by their purchase value, are:

*   **Northern Enterprises** with **$45,314.03**
*   **Midwest Manufacturing** with **$45,121.11**
*   **Pacific Rim Industries** with **$44,311.46**
*   **Acme Corporation** with **$42,436.66**
*   **European Imports Ltd** with **$39,838.12**
*   **Southern Supplies Co** with **$37,753.61**
*   **Coastal Distributors** with **$36,978.96**
*   **Asia Pacific Trading** with **$29,823.90**
*   **Alpine Trading GmbH** with **$24,229.93**
*   **Global Tech Solutions** with **$22,187.26**

These clients represent the highest contributors to the company's revenue, with Northern Enterprises leading the group.

function_results.error: Error: Column 'customer_name' missing in any queried table. Check schema.
function_results.query:
SELECT
  c.customer_name,
  SUM(o.order_value) AS client_spend
FROM customers AS c
JOIN orders AS o
  ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
GROUP BY
  c.customer_name
ORDER BY
  client_spend DESC
LIMIT 10;

function_results.query:
SELECT
  c.name AS customer_name,
  SUM(o.amount_sum) AS client_spend
FROM customers AS c
JOIN orders AS o
  ON c.id = o.customer_id
GROUP BY
  c.name
ORDER BY
  client_spend DESC
LIMIT 10;

6aba49f9-5ba3-48a6-a951-6f999dbbac50.title: What are the highest paying clients by order value...

messages.content: What are the highest paying clients by order value? (Please avoid the words "total", "top" and "rank" when you respond)

The clients contributing the most significantly by order value are led by **Northern Enterprises** with an order value of **$45,314.03**, closely followed by **Midwest Manufacturing** at **$45,121.11**, and **Pacific Rim Industries** with **$44,311.46**. These figures indicate that these three clients are key contributors to the overall sales performance.

function_results.query: SELECT c.name AS client_name, SUM(o.amount_sum) AS order_value FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY order_value DESC LIMIT 10

function_results.title: Highest Paying Clients by Order Value
